properties.name: Miveh Rud (Miveh Rood; Mivehrood; Movārī; Muvāri; Myuvari), Arzil Rural District, Kharvana District, Varzaqan County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Miveh Rud (Miveh Rood; Mivehrood; Movārī; Muvāri; Myuvari), Arzil Rural District, Kharvana District, Varzaqan County, East Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

Hornfels and skarn originated due to extensive thermal metamorphism and metasomatism caused by the intrusion of an Upper Miocene shallow pluton and numerous dykes and sills of felsic–intermediate compositions into Upper Cretaceous, flysch-type sediment...

properties.name: Panj-Kuh iron deposit (Panj-Kuh iron mine), Damghan County, Semnan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Panj-Kuh iron deposit (Panj-Kuh iron mine), Damghan County, Semnan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The Panj-Kuh iron deposit is located 50 km southeast of Damghan within the Central Iranian Zone (CIZ). The Panj-Kuh deposit is hosted mainly in the Eocene andesite and basalt volcano-pyroclastic rocks as well as Oligocene syenite, monzonite and gab...
